column1: #Text=Suki says : " Well , we made it out .
#Text=" Zuko says : " My sister was on that island .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , and she 's probably right behind us , so let 's not stop !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What I mean is she must have come here somehow .
#Text=The thing I do n't understand is " Why ? "
#Text=" Mai says : " I guess you just do n't know people as well as you think you do .
#Text=I love Zuko more than I fear you .
#Text=" Gondola guard # 4 says : " What shall we do with them , princess ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Put them somewhere I 'll never have to see their faces again , and let them rot !
#Text=" Katara says : " What are you doing in this thing ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " It kind of got destroyed .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sounds like a crazy fishing trip .
#Text=" Toph says : " Did you at least get some good meat ?
#Text=" Katara says : " How are you here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " We kind of went to a Fire Nation prison .
